describe: Tunisia is a North African country bordering the Mediterranean Sea and Sahara Desert. Known for its rich history, Tunisia is home to ancient ruins, vibrant markets, and stunning beaches.

cities.name: 🏝 Tunis
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northern part of Tunisia, near the Mediterranean coast.
cities.climate: Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters.

cities.name: 🏝 Sousse
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the eastern coast of Tunisia, along the Gulf of Hammamet.
cities.climate: Mediterranean climate with warm, dry summers and mild, wet winters.

cities.name: 🏝 Djerba
cities.geographical_location: An island located off the southern coast of Tunisia in the Gulf of Gabes.
cities.climate: Semi-arid climate with hot summers and mild winters.
